{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
  <REFERENCE>
    <BIBL>
      <TITLE>Mangoldische Bibel</TITLE>
      <YEAR>1729</YEAR>
    </BIBL>
  </REFERENCE>
  <REFERENCE>
    <BIBL>
      <TITLE>Jelische Lexicon</TITLE>
      <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME>
    </BIBL>
  </REFERENCE>
  <REFERENCE>
    <BIBL>
      <AUTHOR>Stettlers</AUTHOR>
      <TITLE>Schweitzer-Chronick</TITLE>
    </BIBL>
  </REFERENCE>
  <REFERENCE>
    <BIBL>
      <TITLE>Reich der Todten</TITLE>
    </BIBL>
  </REFERENCE>
  <NOTE>samt noch einigen anderen neuen frzösisch historischen Bücheren, davon der Catalogus bey Herrn M. Daniel Meyer im Collegio zu sehen ist, als welcher diese Bücher zu verkauffen in Kommission hat.</NOTE>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":5,"explanation":"Added a root element <ITEM> to encapsulate the entire content. Separated each book reference into distinct <REFERENCE> elements. Added proper nesting for <BIBL> elements. Corrected the escaped Unicode characters to their proper representations. Added a <NOTE> element for the additional text."}

parsed.fixed_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
  <REFERENCE>
    <BIBL>
      <TITLE>Mangoldische Bibel</TITLE>
      <YEAR>1729</YEAR>
    </BIBL>
  </REFERENCE>
  <REFERENCE>
    <BIBL>
      <TITLE>Jelische Lexicon</TITLE>
      <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME>
    </BIBL>
  </REFERENCE>
  <REFERENCE>
    <BIBL>
      <AUTHOR>Stettlers</AUTHOR>
      <TITLE>Schweitzer-Chronick</TITLE>
    </BIBL>
  </REFERENCE>
  <REFERENCE>
    <BIBL>
      <TITLE>Reich der Todten</TITLE>
    </BIBL>
  </REFERENCE>
  <NOTE>samt noch einigen anderen neuen frzösisch historischen Bücheren, davon der Catalogus bey Herrn M. Daniel Meyer im Collegio zu sehen ist, als welcher diese Bücher zu verkauffen in Kommission hat.</NOTE>
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation: Added a root element <ITEM> to encapsulate the entire content. Separated each book reference into distinct <REFERENCE> elements. Added proper nesting for <BIBL> elements. Corrected the escaped Unicode characters to their proper representations. Added a <NOTE> element for the additional text.
